resources.string: Touch the + button to add a player. Long press a player\'s name to delete the player.

Add : Add the sum of the three values of the triangle to your score (empty fields will be considered equal to 0). You can correct a mistake by adding/subtracting a value (to subtract put a "-" sign in front of the value ex: -22).
 
 Reset : Reset your score.
 
 Pick : Pick up a tile and lose 5 points. If you have picked up three tiles and still can't play, touch a 4th time to apply the 10 point penalty.
 
 Hexagon : Touch this button if you score a hexagon. Long press if you score a double hexagon.
 
 Bridge : Touch this button if you score a bridge.
